name: My Dying Bride
description:
'''My Dying Bride''' are an English [[doom metal]] band formed in [[Bradford]]. Since their inception in 1990, they have released 15 studio albums, five EPs, one demo, one box set, four compilation albums, one live album, and one live CD/DVD release.

Along with [[Anathema (band)|Anathema]] and [[Paradise Lost (band)|Paradise Lost]], My Dying Bride were a forerunner of the [[death doom metal]] and [[gothic metal]] genres during the early 1990s. These bands comprise "The Peaceville Three" as all were signed to [[Peaceville Records]] at the time.
